Set level requirements Set where an item will be equipped

item.title: How do you
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

Search for something like

public int getStrength(int ItemID) {
	if (ItemID == -1) {
		return 1;
	}
	String ItemName = GetItemName(ItemID);
	if (ItemName.startsWith("Granite")) {
		return 50;
	} else if (ItemName.startsWith("Torags hammers") || ItemName.endsWith("Dharoks greataxe")) {
		return 70;
	} else if (ItemName.startsWith("Strength hood")) {
		return 100;
	} else if (ItemName.startsWith("Strength cape")) {
		return 100;
	}
	return 1;
}

or something and change the return ##;'s
